actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend section 410 of title 39, United States Code, to provide that certain provisions of the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 shall apply to the Postal Service.

summary.text: Provides that the provisions of the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 relating to cooperation and availability of agency information shall apply to the Postal Service. (Amends 39 U.S.C. 410)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 410 of title 39, United States Code, to provide that certain provisions of the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 shall apply to the Postal Service.
